items.title: Save up to $694 on Lectric e-bikes as you upgrade your 2026 commute during its New Year Sale – deals start from $999
items.summary:
With its long-term extended holiday sale having officially come to an end, Lectric has now launched its New Year Sale with up to $694 savings across its lineup. Of course, the biggest deals during this new event are on Lectric’s XPedition 2 Cargo e-bikes, with the standard 13Ah e-bike getting a $346 bundle at $1,399 shipped, while the 26Ah dual-battery e-bike is getting a $545 bundle at $1,799 shipped, and the 35Ah dual-battery long-range e-bike is seeing the $694 bundle at $1,999 shipped. Without the usual savings on the bundles themselves, as is common during Lectric’s sale events, you’d have to pay either $1,745, $2,344, or $2,693 for these same packages at full price. They may not be the largest bundles like we saw during Black Friday and the previous holiday sale events, but you’re still saving a significant amount – up to $693 – while also upgrading to one of America’s most popular cargo-hauling solutions. Head below to check out the full sale’s lineup of deals.

more…

items.summary:
Running parallel to its ongoing New Year power station sale event, EcoFlow has also launched a special “buy 3, get the cheapest item free” promotion for a selection of its RAPID power banks and GaN charger blocks, while also offering up to 50% discounts on other models not part of the promotion. You’ll find options like EcoFlow’s RAPID 25,000mAh 170W Power Bank down at $94.99 shipped, after using the sitewide 5% off coupon 26EFNYAFF at checkout, which is one of the models included in the “buy 3” promotion. Of course, if you aren’t interested in taking advantage of the promotion, you can find it $5 cheaper over at Amazon. It carries a $200 MSRP direct from the brand, but can more often be found starting from $150 elsewhere, with discounts having kept the cost down at $90 at Amazon since December. Depending on where you pick it up from, you’ll be getting either a $55 markdown directly from EcoFlow or a $60 markdown at Amazon, giving you the third-lowest and second-lowest prices we have tracked.
